content.body: Temporal is stage 3 but not yet shippable, for example
i definitely agree that the time to identify these kinds of risk areas is stage 3 acceptance - i have an open process document PR to that effect
A question, why Temporal not named `Time`?
because it's a DateTime library, not just a Time library :D
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: because it's a DateTime library, not just a Time library :D

content.body:
> <@jackworks:matrix.org> A question, why Temporal not named `Time`?

To me, temporal reads as ‚Äúabout time‚Äù rather than ‚Äútime‚Äù, so it stretches to cover ‚Äúdate‚Äù, ‚Äúmoment‚Äù, ‚Äúduration‚Äù, ‚Äúclock‚Äù, ‚Äúcalendar‚Äù, ‚Äútimezone‚Äù, ‚Äúappointment‚Äù, and ‚Äúprocrastinate‚Äù more easily. Every precedent has been tried and this one‚Äôs not the worst.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @jackworks:matrix.org
A question, why Temporal not named `Time`?
To me, temporal reads as ‚Äúabout time‚Äù rather than ‚Äútime‚Äù, so it stretches to cover ‚Äúdate‚Äù, ‚Äúmoment‚Äù, ‚Äúduration‚Äù, ‚Äúclock‚Äù, ‚Äúcalendar‚Äù, ‚Äútimezone‚Äù, ‚Äúappointment‚Äù, and ‚Äúprocrastinate‚Äù more easily. Every precedent has been tried and this one‚Äôs not the worst.

content.body: But yes, if we did not tend to conflate Time with wall-clock time by default, Time would be a better name for the namespace.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: But yes, if we did not tend to conflate Time with wall-clock time by default, Time would be a better name for the namespace.

content.body: It‚Äôs like, what do you call a Test in a test framework?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: It‚Äôs like, what do you call a Test in a test framework?

content.body: Or, what do you call a Module in a module system? (Trick question, you name *nothing* Module and burn its page in the dictionary)

content.body: I like this as, in practice, it will be much nicer than Date
I guess even more importantly, it's that Time sounds like a companion to, and not a replacement for, Date
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I guess even more importantly, it's that Time sounds like a companion to, and not a replacement for, Date

content.body: That‚Äôs a really good point, the ‚Äúmarketing message‚Äù is a bit easier with a more distinct name
